name: Linda
reviwe: Welcome to Makeup and Beauty Blog! My name is Linda, and Im a freelance writer obsessed with makeup.Makeup and Beauty Blog features daily product reviews, makeup tips and beauty news — like an interactive version of a monthly print magazine, except with occasional pictures of my cat.
